channel.title: China News | Today's Breaking Stories | Reuters
channel.description: Reuters.com is your online source for the latest China news stories and current events, ensuring our readers up to date with any breaking news developments - Made with love by RSSHub(https://github.com/DIYgod/RSSHub)

image.title: China News | Today's Breaking Stories | Reuters

item.title: 菲律宾特使表示，特朗普担任总统期间印太立场没有变化
item.description: The United States' Indo-Pacific strategy will unlikely change should Donald Trump win in the presidential race, the Philippines' longtime ambassador to Washington said on Wednesday.翻译:菲律宾长期驻华盛顿大使周三表示，如果唐纳德·特朗普在总统竞选中获胜，美国的印太战略不太可能改变。
item.author: Karen Lema

item.title: 由于对自由的担忧，香港准备制定更严格的安全法
item.description: A public consultation period for a new Hong Kong national security law closes on Wednesday amid concerns that the legislation, which authorities want to put in place soon, will further erode freedoms in the financial hub.翻译:香港新国家安全法的公众咨询期于周三结束，人们担心当局希望尽快实施的这项立法将进一步侵蚀这个金融中心的自由。
item.author: James Pomfret, Jessie Pang

item.title: 需求预期看跌挑战铁矿石价格弹性
item.description: Iron ore prices, long resilient despite China's gloomy economic outlook, have tumbled since the end of the Lunar New Year holiday, sparking concerns around faltering demand and denting mining stocks in top producer Australia.翻译:尽管中国经济前景黯淡，但铁矿石价格长期保持坚挺，但自农历新年假期结束以来，铁矿石价格大幅下跌，引发了人们对需求疲软的担忧，并削弱了澳大利亚主要生产国的矿业股。
item.author: Amy Lv, Tony Munroe

item.title: 碧桂园：债务问题有多严重？
item.description: Chinese developer Country Garden said on Wednesday a liquidation petition has been filed against it for non-payment of a $205 million loan, clouding its debt revamp prospects and undermining Beijing's effort to restore confidence in the property sector.翻译:中国开发商碧桂园周三表示，已因其未支付2.05亿美元贷款而收到清算申请，这给其债务重组前景蒙上了阴影，并削弱了北京方面恢复房地产行业信心的努力。
item.author: Yu Xie

item.title: 图瓦卢新政府重申与台湾的关系
item.description: Tuvalu's new government has reaffirmed its relations with Taiwan after last month's election, Tuvalu's government said in a statement, adding that it wants dialogue with Australia over a security pact signed last year.翻译:图瓦卢政府在一份声明中表示，图瓦卢新政府在上个月的选举后重申了与台湾的关系，并补充说它希望与澳大利亚就去年签署的安全协议进行对话。
item.author: Alasdair Pal, Kirsty Needham

item.title: 消息人士称，中国鼎晖投资正在洽谈收购价值 17 亿美元的越南杂货连锁店的少数股权
item.description: China's CDH Investments is in advanced talks to buy a minority stake in Bach Hoa Xanh (BHX) from Vietnam retailer Mobile World in a deal that could value the grocery chain at up to $1.7 billion, two sources with direct knowledge said.翻译:两位直接知情人士称，中国鼎晖投资公司正在就从越南零售商 Mobile World 手中收购 Bach Hoa Xanh (BHX) 少数股权进行深入谈判，这笔交易可能使这家杂货连锁店的估值高达 17 亿美元。
item.author: Phuong Nguyen, Yantoultra Ngui

item.title: 丰田1月份全球产量增长7%
item.description: Japan's Toyota Motor said on Wednesday global vehicle production rose by 7% in January, marking a year-on-year increase for the 13th straight month as the automaker benefited from strong U.S. demand.翻译:日本丰田汽车周三表示，受益于美国强劲的需求，1 月份全球汽车产量增长 7%，连续第 13 个月同比增长。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 独家：消息人士称，随着中海油退出，嘉能可关注壳牌新加坡资产
item.description: Swiss miner and commodities trader Glencore is looking at buying Shell's oil refinery and petrochemical units in Singapore as the oil major seeks a buyer for the sites after earlier suitors dropped out, several industry and trading sources said.翻译:几位行业和贸易消息人士称，瑞士矿业和大宗商品贸易商嘉能可(Glencore)正在考虑收购壳牌在新加坡的炼油厂和石化部门，该石油巨头在先前的收购者退出后正在寻找买家。
item.author: Chen Aizhu, Trixie Yap, Yantoultra Ngui

item.title: 中国扩大国家秘密法，将“工作秘密”纳入其中
item.description: Chinese lawmakers have expanded Beijing's state secrets law for the first time since 2010, widening the scope of restricted sensitive information to "work secrets" according to a full text of the law published online, state media reported.翻译:据官方媒体报道，中国立法者自 2010 年以来首次扩大了北京的《国家秘密法》，根据网上发布的该法全文，将受限制的敏感信息范围扩大到“工作秘密”。
item.author: Laurie Chen

item.title: 韩国和美国将举行年度演习，重点关注朝鲜核威胁
item.description: South Korea and the United States will begin their annual spring military drills next week with a focus on heading off North Korea's potential use of nuclear weapons, officials said on Wednesday.翻译:官员周三表示，韩国和美国将于下周开始年度春季军事演习，重点是阻止朝鲜使用核武器的可能性。
item.author: Hyonhee Shin

item.title: 中国称其海警在台湾岛屿周围巡逻“无可非议”
item.description: China's government said on Wednesday that its coast guard patrols around a group of Taiwanese islands near the Chinese coast were "beyond reproach", and dismissed complaints the boarding of a Taiwan tourist boat had caused panic.翻译:中国政府周三表示，中国海警在中国海岸附近的台湾岛屿周围的巡逻“无可非议”，并驳回了有关台湾游船登船引发恐慌的抱怨。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 美国通胀测试即将到来，亚洲股市走势缓慢；猕猴桃幻灯片
item.description: Asian stocks were tentative on Wednesday ahead of a U.S. inflation reading this week that could influence the timing of the Federal Reserve's easing cycle, while the New Zealand dollar fell sharply after the central bank softened its hawkish stance on rates.翻译:周三亚洲股市在美国本周公布的通胀数据之前表现谨慎，这可能会影响美联储宽松周期的时机，而在央行软化利率鹰派立场后，新西兰元大幅下跌。
item.author: Ankur Banerjee

item.title: 中国称北京和莫斯科应加强亚太协调
item.description: China and Russia should strengthen communication and coordination in Asia Pacific affairs and jointly safeguard regional security, stability and development, the Chinese foreign ministry reported on Wednesday.翻译:中国外交部周三表示，中俄应加强在亚太事务中的沟通协调，共同维护地区安全、稳定和发展。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 菲律宾总统称中国海军在南海的存在“令人担忧”
item.description: Philippine President Ferdinand Marcos Jr. on Wednesday said the Chinese navy's presence in the South China Sea is "worrisome" but will not deter his country from defending its maritime territory and protecting its fishermen.翻译:菲律宾总统小费迪南德·马科斯周三表示，中国海军在南海的存在“令人担忧”，但不会阻止菲律宾保卫其海洋领土和保护其渔民。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 碧桂园清算申请加剧中国房地产困境
item.description: Chinese developer Country Garden said on Wednesday a liquidation petition has been filed against it for non-payment of a $205 million loan, clouding its debt revamp prospects and undermining Beijing's effort to restore confidence in the property sector.翻译:中国开发商碧桂园周三表示，已因其未支付2.05亿美元贷款而收到清算申请，这给其债务重组前景蒙上了阴影，并削弱了北京方面恢复房地产行业信心的努力。
item.author: Scott Murdoch, Clare Jim, Yu Xie

item.title: 中国敦促最大核国家谈判“不首先使用”条约
item.description: States with the largest nuclear arsenals should negotiate a treaty on no-first-use of nuclear weapons against each other or make a political statement in this regard, the Chinese foreign ministry's arms control department said.翻译:中国外交部军控司表示，拥有最大核武库的国家应谈判签署互不首先使用核武器条约或就此发表政治声明。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 兄弟姐妹帮助中国比亚迪在泰国电动汽车市场抢占先机
item.description: After launching BYD in Thailand as the Chinese electric vehicle maker's sole national distributor a little more than a year ago, siblings Pratarnwong and Pratarnporn Phornprapha were forced to rip up business plans frequently because sales kept rocketing.翻译:一年多前，比亚迪作为这家中国电动汽车制造商在泰国的唯一全国经销商推出后，Pratarnwong 和 Pratarnporn Phornprapha 兄弟姐妹被迫频繁撕毁商业计划，因为销量不断飙升。
item.author: Devjyot Ghoshal, Chayut Setboonsarng

item.title: 应用材料公司收到美国证券交易委员会 (SEC) 关于向中国发货的传票
item.description: Semiconductor equipment supplier Applied Materials received a subpoena from the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) in February, requesting information relating to certain China customer shipments, the company said in a filing on Tuesday.翻译:半导体设备供应商应用材料公司在周二提交的文件中表示，该公司二月份收到美国证券交易委员会（SEC）发出的传票，要求提供与某些中国客户发货相关的信息。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 早盘竞价：全球货币焦点转向新西兰
item.description: A look at the day ahead in Asian markets.翻译:展望未来一天的亚洲市场。
item.author: Jamie McGeever

item.title: 美国参议员质疑拜登的也门战略，希望得到国会授权
item.description: U.S. Democratic and Republican senators on Tuesday questioned President Joe Biden’s strategy to deal with Houthi attacks against commercial shipping and contended he should seek congressional authorization for ongoing military action against the Yemen-based group.翻译:美国民主党和共和党参议员周二质疑乔·拜登总统应对胡塞武装袭击商业航运的战略，并认为他应该寻求国会授权对也门组织持续采取军事行动。
item.author: Reuters
